languages.text: "Как видишь, твоя система несовершенна, Инскрибия. Но я милостив{mf||а} — возместите ущерб, нанесенный лорду Моллесу, и пусть он решает участь своей жены и клерка-взяточника".
languages.translation_comment:
дать очков схизматика
Стартует этюд VC_MollesWin
Никого не казним
Весы налево

дать очков схизматика
Стартует этюд VC_MollesWin
Никого не казним
Весы налево

languages.text: "As you can see, Inscribia, your system is imperfect. But I am merciful: compensate Lord Molles for the damage he has incurred, and let him decide the fate of his wife and the venal clerk."
languages.original_text: "Как видишь, твоя система несовершенна, Инскрибия. Но я милостив{mf||а} — возместите ущерб, нанесенный лорду Моллесу, и пусть он решает участь своей жены и клерка-взяточника".

traits.locale_text: "As you can see, Inscribia, your system is imperfect. But I am merciful: compensate Lord Molles for the damage he has incurred, and let him decide the fate of his wife and the venal clerk."
"As you can see, Inscribia, your system is imperfect. But I am merciful: compensate Lord Molles for the damage he has incurred, and let him decide the fate of his wife and the venal clerk."

"As you can see, Inscribia, your system is imperfect. But I am merciful: compensate Lord Molles for the damage he has incurred, and let him decide the fate of his wife and the venal clerk."

languages.text: "Wie Ihr seht, ist Euer System fehlerhaft, Inscribia. Aber ich will gnädig sein. Entschädigt Lord Molles für den ihm entstandenen Schaden und lasst ihn über das Schicksal seiner Frau und den korrupten Beamten entscheiden.
languages.original_text: "As you can see, Inscribia, your system is imperfect. But I am merciful: compensate Lord Molles for the damage he has incurred, and let him decide the fate of his wife and the venal clerk."

traits.locale_text: "Wie Ihr seht, ist Euer System fehlerhaft, Inscribia. Aber ich will gnädig sein. Entschädigt Lord Molles für den ihm entstandenen Schaden und lasst ihn über das Schicksal seiner Frau und den korrupten Beamten entscheiden.

languages.text: « Comme vous pouvez le constater, Inscribia, votre système est imparfait. Mais je suis d'humeur magnanime : que le seigneur Molles soit dédommagé pour les torts qui lui ont été faits, et qu'il décide du sort de sa femme et du greffier vénal. »
languages.original_text: "As you can see, Inscribia, your system is imperfect. But I am merciful: compensate Lord Molles for the damage he has incurred, and let him decide the fate of his wife and the venal clerk."

traits.locale_text: « Comme vous pouvez le constater, Inscribia, votre système est imparfait. Mais je suis d'humeur magnanime : que le seigneur Molles soit dédommagé pour les torts qui lui ont été faits, et qu'il décide du sort de sa femme et du greffier vénal. »

languages.text: “如你所见，缮师，你手底下的机构并非无懈可击。不过，我这个人很仁慈。我要你赔偿莫莱斯勋爵受到的损失，同时由他来决定他的妻子和那位腐败文员的下场。”
languages.original_text: "As you can see, Inscribia, your system is imperfect. But I am merciful: compensate Lord Molles for the damage he has incurred, and let him decide the fate of his wife and the venal clerk."

traits.locale_text: “如你所见，缮师，你手底下的机构并非无懈可击。不过，我这个人很仁慈。我要你赔偿莫莱斯勋爵受到的损失，同时由他来决定他的妻子和那位腐败文员的下场。”

languages.text: «Como puede ver, Inscribia, su sistema no es perfecto. Pero soy compasiv{mf|o|a}: compense a lord Molles por los daños que ha sufrido y permítale decidir el destino de su esposa y del funcionario sobornado».
languages.original_text: "As you can see, Inscribia, your system is imperfect. But I am merciful: compensate Lord Molles for the damage he has incurred, and let him decide the fate of his wife and the venal clerk."

traits.locale_text: «Como puede ver, Inscribia, su sistema no es perfecto. Pero soy compasiv{mf|o|a}: compense a lord Molles por los daños que ha sufrido y permítale decidir el destino de su esposa y del funcionario sobornado».

languages.text: 「インスクリビア。ご覧の通り、君のシステムは完璧ではない。だが{mf|俺|私}は慈悲深い。モレス公に被った損害を補償させ、彼に妻とその汚職職員の運命を決めさせるといい」
languages.original_text: "As you can see, Inscribia, your system is imperfect. But I am merciful: compensate Lord Molles for the damage he has incurred, and let him decide the fate of his wife and the venal clerk."

traits.locale_text: 「インスクリビア。ご覧の通り、君のシステムは完璧ではない。だが{mf|俺|私}は慈悲深い。モレス公に被った損害を補償させ、彼に妻とその汚職職員の運命を決めさせるといい」

languages.text: "Gördüğün üzere İnscribia, bendeki merhamet olmasa sistemin işleyeceği yok. Lord Molles'in uğradığı zarar karşılanacak. Karısının ve rüşvetçi kâtibin kaderine de o karar verecek."
languages.original_text: "As you can see, Inscribia, your system is imperfect. But I am merciful: compensate Lord Molles for the damage he has incurred, and let him decide the fate of his wife and the venal clerk."

traits.locale_text: "Gördüğün üzere İnscribia, bendeki merhamet olmasa sistemin işleyeceği yok. Lord Molles'un uğradığı zarar karşılanacak. Karısının ve rüşvetçi kâtibin kaderine de o karar verecek."
